ModMetaData.name: More Hemogen Vats
ModMetaData.author: zed_0xff
ModMetaData.description:
Different capacity vats for Vanilla Races Expanded - Sanguophage
[list] [*] Increases Hemogen Vat capacity from 200 to 500 packs [*] adds small 1x1 vat with capacity 100 [*] adds large 3x3 vat with capacity 1200 [/list]
XML only. Should be compatible with everything.
